children.Text: If the `source` prop `uri` property is prefixed with "http", then it will be downloaded from the network.
Static assets should be placed in the source code tree, and required in the same way as JavaScript modules.
The `tintColor` style prop changes all the non-alpha pixels to the tint color.
It also works with downloaded images:
The `resizeMode` style prop controls how the image is rendered within the frame.
The `source` prop allows passing in an array of uris, so that native to choose which image to diplay based on the size of the of the target image
Images shipped with the native bundle, but not managed by the JS packager
